name: Liam O'Connor
description: Liam O'Connor is one of Jordan’s close friends, often joining him for weekend plans, debugging rants, or late-night ramen runs.

name: Sophie Lee
description: Sophie Lee is one of Jordan’s close friends, often joining him for weekend plans, debugging rants, or late-night ramen runs.

name: Tatte Bakery & Cafe
description: Tatte Bakery & Cafe is Jordan’s go-to spot for iced coffee and coding sprints, often where he camps out for hours with his laptop.

name: Raj Patel
description: Raj Patel is Jordan’s dad, occasionally texting reminders or sharing practical advice, often replied to with one-liners.

name: Anika Patel
description: Anika Patel is Jordan’s mom, warm and supportive, checking in weekly with food photos and gentle nudges about his sleep habits.

name: Emily Chen
description: Emily Chen oversees Jordan’s projects at Arcadia Robotics, balancing mentorship with an understanding of Jordan’s quirks.

name: Alex Nguyen
description: Alex Nguyen works with Jordan at Arcadia Robotics, often joining daily stand-ups and collaborating on bug-fixes or sprint reviews.

name: Priya Desai
description: Priya Desai works with Jordan at Arcadia Robotics, often joining daily stand-ups and collaborating on bug-fixes or sprint reviews.

name: Carlos Ramirez
description: Carlos Ramirez works with Jordan at Arcadia Robotics, often joining daily stand-ups and collaborating on bug-fixes or sprint reviews.

name: Yuki Sato
description: Yuki Sato helps Jordan with Japanese lessons as he prepares for a future trip to Tokyo and deeper cultural immersion.

name: MIT Hackathon
description: MIT Hackathon coordinates tech meetups and hackathons Jordan eagerly joins to test his skills and meet like-minded coders.

name: Evan Brooks
description: Evan Brooks is one of Jordan’s close friends, often joining him for weekend plans, debugging rants, or late-night ramen runs.

name: Mount Snow Resort
description: Mount Snow Resort is a winter getaway Jordan visited with friends, despite packing the wrong gloves and spending more time in the lodge.

name: Allston Auto Repair
description: Allston Auto Repair is where Jordan gets oil changes and last-minute inspections, usually remembered only when his car throws a warning.

name: Clip Joint Barbershop
description: Clip Joint Barbershop is Jordan’s local barbershop, where he nervously over-explains his desired cut every single time.

name: Dr. Laura Chan
description: Dr. Laura Chan is Jordan’s dentist, known for professional cleanings and giving him the flossing guilt-trip twice a year.

name: Dr. Michael Rios
description: Dr. Michael Rios is Jordan’s go-to for physicals, shot records, and occasional reassurance that his Google diagnoses are wrong.

name: Amtrak
description: Amtrak is Jordan’s favorite way to visit friends in NYC—less stress than flying and just enough time to squeeze in a nap.

name: Brooklyn Tech Collective
description: Brooklyn Tech Collective coordinates tech meetups and hackathons Jordan eagerly joins to test his skills and meet like-minded coders.

name: Blue Bottle Coffee
description: Blue Bottle Coffee is where Jordan indulges his third caffeine fix of the day, especially when deep in a debugging spiral.

name: Arcadia Robotics
description: Arcadia Robotics is the Boston-based robotics startup where Jordan works as a junior software engineer, learning on the fly every day.

name: Kevin Zhou
description: Kevin Zhou is one of Jordan’s close friends, often joining him for weekend plans, debugging rants, or late-night ramen runs.

name: Maya Patel
description: Maya Patel is Jordan’s cousin and occasional confidante, often sending memes or offering family updates between catch-ups.
